code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import allblog from'../blogdata/blog.json';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var AllPostListSidebar=function AllPostListSidebar(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blogcard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"biotitle",children:"Recent Posts"}),allblog.data.slice(2,8).map(function(items,i){localStorage.setItem("AllBlogs",JSON.stringify(items));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"allpostlist",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rpimage",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/".concat(items.blogImage),alt:"img"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"titledate",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"rptitle",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/post/".concat(items.slug),children:items.blogTitle})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"rpdate",children:items.postedOn})]})]});})]})});};export default AllPostListSidebar;
